import styles from './cssRoutes/info.module.css' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import UpdateForm from '../components/dashboard/updateForm' import Input from '../components/form/input' import Select from '../components/form/select' function Info(){ const [sexo, setSexo] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:5000/sexos", { method: "GET", headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) .then((resp) => resp.json()) .then((data) => { setSexo(data) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) return (
) } export default Info
